page.title: 07Small Suburban Shops
page.content: {J.C.McMeeken, the butcher,}has been at Georgetown for over one year. Their customers usually come from the surrounding area. They get between forty and fifty customers each day. The best selling meat is either mince or stewing steak. Every day they get fresh meat from the High Street butchers. {Mister Graham's Family Snips}- this shop has been at Georgetown for five years. It employs four staff. Their customers come form all over Dumfries. They get about forty customers each day. The most common thing that customers want is a perm. Customers are of all ages. The shop is always busy. The life of a hairdresser is a very busy one.
